udfs.initialCode:
def op_fl_nn_condition(
  AI_SERIAL_HOME: Column, 
  OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX: Column,
  ENV_NM: Column,
  BUSINESS_DATE: Column
) = when(
    ((isnull(col("carrier")).and(isnull(col("account")))).and(isnull(col("group")))).and(isnull(col("run_eff_dt"))),
    concat(
      AI_SERIAL_HOME,
      lit("/deliver/."),
      lit("/"),
      OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX,
      lit("form.C."),
      ENV_NM,
      lit("."),
      col("customer_name"),
      lit("."),
      regexp_replace(col("formulary_name"), lit(" +"), lit("-")),
      lit(".NULL_BASE_LINE."),
      BUSINESS_DATE,
      lit(".dat")
    )
  ).when(
      ((isnull(col("carrier")).and(isnull(col("account")))).and(isnull(col("group")))).and(!isnull(col("run_eff_dt"))),
      concat(
        AI_SERIAL_HOME,
        lit("/deliver/."),
        lit("/"),
        OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX,
        lit("form.F."),
        ENV_NM,
        lit("."),
        col("customer_name"),
        lit("."),
        regexp_replace(col("formulary_name"), lit(" +"), lit("-")),
        lit(".NULL_BASE_LINE."),
        BUSINESS_DATE,
        lit(".dat")
      )
    )
    .when(
      (col("carrier") === lit("*ALL")).and(isnull(col("run_eff_dt"))),
      concat(
        AI_SERIAL_HOME,
        lit("/deliver/."),
        lit("/"),
        OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX,
        lit("form.C."),
        ENV_NM,
        lit("."),
        col("customer_name"),
        lit("."),
        regexp_replace(col("formulary_name"), lit(" +"), lit("-")),
        lit(".ALL_ALL_ALL."),
        BUSINESS_DATE,
        lit(".dat")
      )
    )
    .when(
      (col("carrier") === lit("*ALL")).and(!isnull(col("run_eff_dt"))),
      concat(
        AI_SERIAL_HOME,
        lit("/deliver/."),
        lit("/"),
        OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX,
        lit("form.F."),
        ENV_NM,
        lit("."),
        col("customer_name"),
        lit("."),
        regexp_replace(col("formulary_name"), lit(" +"), lit("-")),
        lit(".ALL_ALL_ALL."),
        BUSINESS_DATE,
        lit(".dat")
      )
    )
    .when(
      (((!isnull(col("carrier")))
        .and(col("account") === lit("*ALL")))
        .and(col("group") === lit("*ALL")))
        .and(isnull(col("run_eff_dt"))),
      concat(
        AI_SERIAL_HOME,
        lit("/deliver/."),
        lit("/"),
        OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX,
        lit("form.C."),
        ENV_NM,
        lit("."),
        col("customer_name"),
        lit("."),
        regexp_replace(col("formulary_name"), lit(" +"), lit("-")),
        lit("."),
        col("carrier"),
        lit("_ALL_ALL."),
        BUSINESS_DATE,
        lit(".dat")
      )
    )
    .when(
      (((!isnull(col("carrier")))
        .and(col("account") === lit("*ALL")))
        .and(col("group") === lit("*ALL")))
        .and(!isnull(col("run_eff_dt"))),
      concat(
        AI_SERIAL_HOME,
        lit("/deliver/."),
        lit("/"),
        OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX,
        lit("form.F."),
        ENV_NM,
        lit("."),
        col("customer_name"),
        lit("."),
        regexp_replace(col("formulary_name"), lit(" +"), lit("-")),
        lit("."),
        col("carrier"),
        lit("_ALL_ALL."),
        BUSINESS_DATE,
        lit(".dat")
      )
    )
    .when(
      (((!isnull(col("carrier")))
        .and(!isnull(col("account"))))
        .and(col("group") === lit("*ALL")))
        .and(isnull(col("run_eff_dt"))),
      concat(
        AI_SERIAL_HOME,
        lit("/deliver/."),
        lit("/"),
        OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX,
        lit("form.C."),
        ENV_NM,
        lit("."),
        col("customer_name"),
        lit("."),
        regexp_replace(col("formulary_name"), lit(" +"), lit("-")),
        lit("."),
        col("carrier"),
        lit("_"),
        col("account"),
        lit("_ALL."),
        BUSINESS_DATE,
        lit(".dat")
      )
    )
    .when(
      (((!isnull(col("carrier")))
        .and(!isnull(col("account"))))
        .and(col("group") === lit("*ALL")))
        .and(!isnull(col("run_eff_dt"))),
      concat(
        AI_SERIAL_HOME,
        lit("/deliver/."),
        lit("/"),
        OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX,
        lit("form.F."),
        ENV_NM,
        lit("."),
        col("customer_name"),
        lit("."),
        regexp_replace(col("formulary_name"), lit(" +"), lit("-")),
        lit("."),
        col("carrier"),
        lit("_"),
        col("account"),
        lit("_ALL."),
        BUSINESS_DATE,
        lit(".dat")
      )
    )
    .when(
      isnull(col("run_eff_dt")),
      concat(
        AI_SERIAL_HOME,
        lit("/deliver/."),
        lit("/"),
        OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX,
        lit("form.C."),
        ENV_NM,
        lit("."),
        col("customer_name"),
        lit("."),
        regexp_replace(col("formulary_name"), lit(" +"), lit("-")),
        lit("."),
        col("carrier"),
        lit("_"),
        col("account"),
        lit("_"),
        col("group"),
        lit("."),
        BUSINESS_DATE,
        lit(".dat")
      )
    )
    .otherwise(
      concat(
        AI_SERIAL_HOME,
        lit("/deliver/."),
        lit("/"),
        OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX,
        lit("form.F."),
        ENV_NM,
        lit("."),
        col("customer_name"),
        lit("."),
        regexp_replace(col("formulary_name"), lit(" +"), lit("-")),
        lit("."),
        col("carrier"),
        lit("_"),
        col("account"),
        lit("_"),
        col("group"),
        lit("."),
        BUSINESS_DATE,
        lit(".dat")
      )
    )

metadata.label: flatten_primary_data
metadata.comment: Flattens the primary data column in the input DataFrame, ensuring that each element in the primary data becomes a separate row in the output DataFrame.

properties.script:
val out0 = in0.withColumn("data_path", 
                            op_fl_nn_condition(lit(Config.AI_SERIAL_HOME), 
                                                lit(Config.OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX),
                                                lit(Config.ENV_NM),
                                                lit(Config.BUSINESS_DATE)))

struct(
    col("_id"),
    col("cag_priority"),
    col("formulary_name"),
    col("carrier"),
    col("account"),
    col("group"),
    col("customer_name"),

metadata.label: Normalize_CAG_Data_1
metadata.comment: Normalizes CAG data by selecting specific columns and adding additional computed columns for further analysis.

properties.script:
val out = in.select(
  col("formulary_name"),
  col("formulary_cd"),
  col("carrier"),
  col("account"),
  col("group"),
  col("last_exp_dt"),
  col("ndc11"),
  col("formulary_tier"),
  col("formulary_status"),
  col("pa_reqd_ind"),
  col("specialty_ind"),
  col("step_therapy_ind"),
  col("formulary_tier_desc"),
  col("formulary_status_desc"),
  col("pa_type_cd"),
  col("step_therapy_type_cd"),
  col("step_therapy_group_name"),
  col("step_therapy_step_number"),
  lit("\n").as("newline"),
  col("run_eff_dt"),
  col("customer_name"),
  op_fl_nn_condition(lit(Config.AI_SERIAL_HOME),
    lit(Config.OUTPUT_FILE_PREFIX),
    lit(Config.ENV_NM),
    lit(Config.BUSINESS_DATE)).as("data_path"),
)

metadata.comment: Extracts specific columns from the primary data, reformatting them for further analysis.

metadata.comment: Adds a unique identifier column to the DataFrame.

metadata.label: Accumulate_Products_for_each_CAG_and_Prioritize_1
metadata.comment: Aggregates and prioritizes product information for each carrier, account, and group, based on various criteria. The result includes the latest formulary name, customer name, effective date, data path, and other attributes. The prioritization is determined based on specific conditions and assigns a priority value. The product information is sorted and collected into arrays for each attribute.

when(max(isnull(col("carrier"))),            max(lit(1)))
    .when(max(col("carrier") === lit("*ALL")), max(lit(2)))
    .when(max(((!isnull(col("carrier"))).and(col("account") === lit("*ALL"))).and(col("group") === lit("*ALL"))),
          max(lit(3))
    )
    .when(max(((!isnull(col("carrier"))).and(!isnull(col("account")))).and(col("group") === lit("*ALL"))), max(lit(4)))
    .otherwise(max(lit(5)))
